name: Opaloid Kingdom
description:
Explore the Opaloid Kingdom and take control of a sorcerer sent on a mission by the King.

Play through fast, old-school arcade challenges in a medieval fantasy land! Explore dark dungeons filled with monsters, travel through new towns and meet weird wizards while advancing through obstacles that require skill and reflexes.



Features

  • Play with gamepad or keyboard, both work perfectly.
  • Carefully crafted retro aesthetic, including a CRT filter for old-school visual delight.
  • Overwhelmed by slow games with multiple story choices at every turn? Enjoy an experience based on quick, satisfying gameplay.
  • A wonderful chiptune soundtrack based on authentic medieval songs.
  • Minimalist user interface, no cluttered numbers or text covering up the gameplay.
  • This game is inspired by old-school RPGs but it is an action game based on skill.
